name: Jai
description:
# Controls

* W A S D to walk forward, backward, left and right respectively.

* LeftShift + W to sprint.

* Left mouse button to fist bump.

* Spacebar while on a wall to jump towards camera direction -influenced by WASD.

* Spacebar while facing towards the wall to launch up.

* Spacebar in the air to jump again.

# How To Play

* Fistbump enemies.

* Jumping on cloud enemies will make them explode and bounce the player up.

* Don't die.

* Find the portal at the end of the level to progress.

* Currently there's only 4 level's and beating the game resets the level count.

# Credits

* Music: Kobi Morris

* 3D designs, arena & Cloud enemy: Daniel Spencer

* Concept artist, texture artist -most of his products weren't used in the final build: Jayson Loulier

* Programming & miscellaneous media creation for the game: Seth Thyer
